content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. What is your desired rental price range?
name: Juan Mamani

content:
My desired rental price range is 600-800 Euro per month. I'm willing to consider a higher price if you can justify it.

What is your desired rental price range?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My desired rental price range is 900-1100 Euro per month. However, I am open to discussing a lower price if it is reasonable and fits within your budget.
name: Juan Mamani

content:
I like the apartment, but I have a few concerns about the size. It only has 25 square meters, which is quite small. Is there any way we can discuss a lower rental price or add any additional space to the apartment?

What is your desired rental price range?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your concerns about the size of the apartment. I'm sorry to say that there is no possibility to add more space to the apartment as it is a standard apartment. However, I am open to discussing a lower rental price based on the size of the apartment. What is your desired rental price range?
name: Juan Mamani
